channel.title: Source-Control on Luke Bearl
channel.description: Recent content in Source-Control on Luke Bearl

item.title: Does it even exist if it isn't in source control?
item.description: I was working on a little side project at work to make my employer’s data backup processes a bit more robust which involved writing a small console utility. I was asked if the code for the utility was already in source control (this code represented about 10 hours of effort on my part), and I almost replied “Does it even exist if it isn’t in source control?” Instead, of course, I simply sent the link to the repo where the code lives.
